raw_text: JAYASINGHE TISSA NIHAL,​ Tissa was a devoted husband to Charmaine,​ loving father of Shaumya,​ father-in-law of David and grandfather to Hannelore,​ Nathaniel and Grace,​ brother of Daya,​ Asoka and Senaka,​ passed away at home peacefully on 22nd October 2023. Body will be brought home on Wednesday 25th October at 8.30 a.m. Cortege leaves residence at 1.45 p.m. on the 25th to Kohuwala Public Cemetery for Cremation at 2 p.m. No flowers by request. 11,​ Mudliyar Avenue,​ Kohuwala.068109
